The neighbourhood, renowned for its grand white stucco facades and quiet mews, offers a tranquil residential atmosphere while being in the heart of London. Westminster offers the excitement of central London as well as the tranquillity of secluded residential streets and green open spaces, calling Westminster home means your lifestyle has endless variety. While Westminster itself is a peaceful enclave, it has easy access to renowned theatres and cinemas like The Royal Court theatre on Sloane Square and Everyman Cinema in nearby Chelsea. For recreation and relaxation, residents enjoy exclusive private garden squares and many walk to the expansive green spaces of St. James’s Park and Hyde Park. Transport links are excellent, with multiple tube stations including Pimlico, St. James’s Park, Sloane Square and Victoria providing quick and easy access to the rest of London and beyond.
